description.value:
Runepriests follow one of the major traditions of rune magic: the path of the Wrathful Hammer, the way of the Defiant Word or the tradition of the Serene Blade.

@Compendium[dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.oGav2PDeW4Llr7zp]{Wrathful Hammer}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.oSyDpAL8eHxzWndE]{Defiant Word}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.vziZdX74xmOURTru]{Serene Blade}

Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 98.
